article: 10 Easy Ways to Get Free Clothes From Shein & Score Huge Discounts
intro: Trying to get free clothes on Shein without getting scammed? We’ve got you covered! In this article, we’ll teach you tons of legitimate ways to receive free products from the retailer, plus save money on your entire order. From signing up for exclusive programs to downloading free browser extensions, here’s how you can get (almost) everything on your Shein shopping list for free!

points.name: Sign up for Shein’s Free Trial program.

steps.title: Apply to win free clothes and review them on Shein’s website.
steps.subtitle: Shein’s Free Trial program gives customers a chance to receive clothes for free in exchange for a product review. To , sign into your Shein account, look at the products in the , and hit “Free Trial” on the items you want to try out. Fill out your clothing size and mailing address, then click “Submit.”
sub-points: If you’re chosen to get free products, Shein will email you and send a push notification through their app.
Alternatively, check your product status under “My Applications.” If it says “Approved” but you don’t receive your order within 30 days, contact .

steps.title: Sign up to become a Shein influencer and receive free clothes.
steps.subtitle: Shein’s influencer program is a great way to get free clothes and earn some extra cash. Just fill out the  or send a pitching email to . If you’re selected to be an influencer, Shein will send you a follow up email in 7-10 business days and you can negotiate a contract with them.
sub-points: Shein will look at your social media follower count and engagement rate. So if you don’t have many followers, email them for a gifting opportunity instead. This allows you to get free clothes in exchange for product reviews.

points.name: Install a browser extension for active coupons.

steps.title: Download  or  to get up to 20% off your order.
steps.subtitle: When you’re ready to make your purchase, activate the extension on the check out page, and wait a few seconds for it to test all the available codes—the extension applies the largest discount before you make your purchase.
sub-points: Alternatively, search Google, YouTube, or TikTok for active coupon codes and manually input the code on the checkout page.

points.name: Post product reviews to earn Shein points.

steps.title: Review your past purchases to earn points for new clothes.
steps.subtitle: If you post a review of an item you’ve bought, Shein gives you 5 points that you can use toward any future purchase (1 point=$0.01). Just log into your account, click on “My Orders,” then go to “View Details” of the item you want to review. From there, click “Write a Review” and earn away!
sub-points: A review with a photo earns an extra 10 points (15 total points).
A review with size information earns an extra 2 points (17 total points).
You can earn a maximum of 2000 points per day for posting product reviews.

points.name: Check in on the app to earn rewards.

steps.title: Press the “Check In” button on the home screen to earn Shein points.
steps.subtitle: One point is worth $0.01, but you can receive 73 points if you check in for 7 consecutive days. Once you earn enough points to get the clothes you want, apply them to your order on the checkout page.
sub-points: Points only apply for up to 70% off the total price of your order—excluding tax, shipping costs, and insurance.

points.name: Stack discounts on your Shein order.

steps.title: Apply a reference code and coupon on your order for the biggest discount.
steps.subtitle: Type “Shein reference code” on Google, YouTube, or TikTok, and then input the code on the “My Reference” page on your account—this gives you $2 off every purchase (over $29) for the next 90 days. On the checkout page, tap the “Apply Coupon” button and select an available coupon to .
sub-points: New customers get 15% off their first order of $49+ by making an account.
Students get 15% off their order by verifying their student status on UniDays.
